channel.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed
channel.description: A daily digest of curated Latin American news.

item.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed - September 04, 2025
item.author: LatAm Prompt News Feed
item.description:
Mexico influencers in crosshairs of drug cartel war amid spate of attacks — The Guardian

Targeting of influencers reflects their alleged role in money laundering – and their place in cartel propaganda Earlier this year, pamphlets fluttered down from a helicopter over Culiacán, capital of the Mexican state of Sinaloa, accusing an array of influencers and musicians of serving organised crime. Four of the 25 faces on the pamphlet already had “ELIMINATED” stamped across them. Since then, two more have been picked off. Continue reading...

Trump’s Gunboat Diplomacy Takes Aim at Maduro — Bloomberg

Trump’s Gunboat Diplomacy Takes Aim at Maduro

Opinion | Trump’s Gunboat War on Drugs — The Wall Street Journal

Venezuelan capos get a kinetic message, and so does kingpin Maduro.

Bolsonaro Has Only Himself to Blame — Bloomberg

Bolsonaro Has Only Himself to Blame
